directions: Combine water, miso, aminos, and bouillon base in a saucepan over medium heat. Sift cornstarch, onion powder, and garlic into the mixture and whisk until no lumps remain. Bring to a simmer; cook until thickened, 6 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable bouillon base (such as Better Than Bouillon®)
¼ teaspoon onion powder, or to taste  (Optional)
¼ teaspoon garlic granules, or to taste  (Optional)
title: Miso Gravy (Gluten Free and Vegan)
